name: FI (9)
description:
The crash occurred in the eastbound lane of a 2-lane 2-way roadway.  This was a straight, level, bituminous roadway with a posted speed of  40 kmph (25 mph).  It was evening on a weekday and the road was dark but lighted, dry and the sky was clear.
vehicle1, a vehicle1 was traveling eastbound. the driver of vehicle1 stated that she was approaching a stop sign and attempted to hit her brakes. the brakes went to the floor so she put the vehicle in park. the steering then locked up and the front of her vehicle contacted the back of vehicle2, vehicle2 estate wagon that was parked on the south side of the road facing the same direction.
